replies.bodyText:
Well, this is for the auto instrumentation. The exporter and the auto instrumenter implementations don't know about each other, so we use SPI to load the exporter dynamically based on a JAR file name that's passed.
Have a look here: https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-auto-instr-java/blob/239eb53a44000f9f77e251a79e7189883451f5fc/agent-tooling/src/main/java/io/opentelemetry/auto/tooling/TracerInstaller.java#L41
